title: Migrating to This Website for Blogs!
author: skyss0fly
content: Hello Folks. Today I Created the blog repository, but since then, I Also Made this Blog Website and as Such, All Blogs will Go to this website! Last Blog of Today, I promise!

title: Happy Birthday to me!

content: Hello Folks. Today I turned 17 years of age and I've had a pretty decent birthday apart from being stacked with assignments from school:(

title: A New Change in The Organisation!
author: skyss0fly
content: Hello Folks. I've decided to come back to this repository and give it a fresh update. With the Funworld SMP kicking off soon, it's only a matter of time before the development team will have to spring into action and get developing the plugins. And so I just privated some old repositories, updated the Organisation readme, and created this Blog Repository!

title: A Swift Change in Languages!
author: skyss0fly
content: Hello Folks. With FunworldMC retiring from PocketMine, our languages will change from PHP to Java. So stay tuned for future updates!
